hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Deku Shield# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zelda's Letter# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Why are they called Wallmasters if they come from the ceiling?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Cojiro# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Eyedrops#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mask of Truth#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #0# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Morpha#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Bow# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZD (Mweep).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Pocket Egg# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Epona's Song#.
